1.title: Swimming in dire straits

episode of.title: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: A live session of spirit ism in front of a studio audience with a new contestant. Reverend Piccard is the show host and is asking the contestant to travel where no earthling has been before, to the after life and go beyond where anyone has dared to go.

2.title: Spying on the enemy

episode of.title: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: The show host believes someone in his mind is preventing the contestant to open up. Reverend Piccard needs to carry out a full assessment and test the contestant with absurd questions without even getting an answer.

episode of.title: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt (TV Series 2018– )

episode of.title: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt (TV Series 2018– )

imdb.title: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt
akas: Beyond the Sphere of Reasonable Doubt (United States)
plot: When everything else in life has failed, it's time to embark on a journey to the after life to discover what lies ahead and beyond the sphere of reasonable doubt.::Nick Peterson
